plan_overview: This learning plan guides you through foundational concepts of deep learning, progressing to specialized applications and research frontiers. Starting with introductory materials to build core understanding, you will then explore practical applications in computer vision and system identification, followed by critical evaluations of deep learning's role in various domains including pure mathematics and tabular data. The plan balances theory, practice, and critical analysis to develop a well-rounded expertise in deep learning.

reading_order.why_first: This paper provides a beginner-friendly introduction to deep learning concepts and Python implementations, establishing a solid foundation.
key_questions: What are the fundamental components of deep neural networks?
How do basic deep learning algorithms work?
How to implement simple deep learning models in Python?
reading_order.paper_title: Deep Learning: From Basics to Building Deep Neural Networks with Python

reading_order.why_first: This paper complements the beginner introduction by covering basic structures and popular use cases, deepening your conceptual understanding.
key_questions: What are common architectures used in deep learning?
What are typical applications of deep learning?
How do different layers and activation functions contribute to model performance?

reading_order.why_first: Provides a broad overview of deep learning's evolution and future directions, helping you contextualize your learning within the field's landscape.
key_questions: What is the historical development of deep learning?
What are the predicted future trends such as deep cortical learning?
How does deep learning relate to neuroscience concepts?
reading_order.paper_title:
Deep learning research landscape & roadmap in a nutshell: past, present
  and future -- Towards deep cortical learning

reading_order.why_first: Introduces a practical application of deep learning in microscopy autofocusing, demonstrating real-world impact and model deployment.
key_questions: How can deep learning be applied to image autofocusing?
What architectures are effective for microscopy image analysis?
How does deep learning improve speed and accuracy over traditional methods?
reading_order.paper_title: Single-shot autofocusing of microscopy images using deep learning

reading_order.why_first: Explores an interpretable deep learning model for blind deconvolution, combining classical techniques with neural networks, enhancing your understanding of model-aware architectures.
key_questions: What is deep unfolded Richardson-Lucy network?
How can interpretability be integrated into deep learning models?
What are the benefits of combining classical estimation with deep learning?
reading_order.paper_title:
Deep-URL: A Model-Aware Approach To Blind Deconvolution Based On Deep
  Unfolded Richardson-Lucy Network

reading_order.why_first: Focuses on deep state space models for nonlinear system identification, expanding your knowledge on temporal models and probabilistic deep learning.
key_questions: What are deep state space models?
How do deep SSMs relate to classical system identification?
How is uncertainty modeled in deep learning for dynamic systems?
reading_order.paper_title: Deep State Space Models for Nonlinear System Identification

reading_order.why_first: Critically evaluates deep learning versus traditional methods on tabular data, teaching you to assess model suitability and limitations.
key_questions: Why might tree ensembles outperform deep learning on tabular data?
What are the challenges of applying deep learning to tabular datasets?
How to compare and tune models for real-world data?
reading_order.paper_title: Tabular Data: Deep Learning is Not All You Need

reading_order.why_first: Examines the feasibility and performance of running deep learning models in web browsers, highlighting practical deployment considerations.
key_questions: What are the capabilities of JavaScript-based deep learning frameworks?
How does browser-based deep learning performance compare to native platforms?
What are the limitations and use cases of in-browser deep learning?
reading_order.paper_title: Moving Deep Learning into Web Browser: How Far Can We Go?

reading_order.why_first: Offers a perspective on the utility of deep learning for pure mathematicians, broadening your view on interdisciplinary applications.
key_questions: How can deep learning assist in pure mathematics research?
What are the limitations of deep learning in abstract mathematical contexts?
What insights can mathematicians gain from deep learning tools?
reading_order.paper_title: Is deep learning a useful tool for the pure mathematician?

reading_order.why_first: Presents advanced theoretical results on deep generic sets, connecting deep learning concepts with computability and complexity theory, suitable for advanced exploration.
key_questions: What defines a deep 1-generic set?
How does Kolmogorov complexity relate to deep learning theory?
What implications do these theoretical results have for understanding deep models?

actions.label: Implement basic deep learning models in Python
actions.how_to: Follow tutorials and code examples from the introductory paper (2205.01069) to build simple neural networks using Python libraries like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
actions.expected_outcome: You will have hands-on experience coding and training basic deep learning models.

actions.label: Analyze deep learning architectures and use cases
actions.how_to: Study the structures and applications described in paper 2003.03253, summarizing key architectures and their typical domains.
actions.expected_outcome: You will understand different deep learning architectures and where they are effectively applied.

actions.label: Reproduce microscopy autofocusing results
actions.how_to: Use the methodology from paper 2003.09585 to implement or simulate a deep learning-based autofocusing system on microscopy images.
actions.expected_outcome: You will gain practical experience applying deep learning to image processing tasks.

actions.label: Explore interpretable deep learning models
actions.how_to: Study and implement the Deep-URL model from paper 2002.01053 to understand model-aware architectures and interpretability.
actions.expected_outcome: You will learn how to combine classical estimation with deep learning for interpretable models.

actions.label: Experiment with deep state space models
actions.how_to: Implement or simulate deep state space models as described in paper 2003.14162 to model nonlinear dynamic systems.
actions.expected_outcome: You will understand temporal modeling and uncertainty estimation in deep learning.

actions.label: Evaluate deep learning versus traditional models on tabular data
actions.how_to: Conduct experiments comparing deep learning models and tree ensembles on tabular datasets following the approach in paper 2106.03253.
actions.expected_outcome: You will develop skills in model evaluation and selection for structured data.

actions.label: Benchmark deep learning frameworks in browsers
actions.how_to: Test JavaScript-based deep learning frameworks as per paper 1901.09388 to assess their capabilities and performance.
actions.expected_outcome: You will understand practical constraints and opportunities for browser-based deep learning.

actions.label: Reflect on deep learning's role in pure mathematics
actions.how_to: Read and summarize insights from paper 2304.12602, considering how deep learning can aid mathematical research.
actions.expected_outcome: You will appreciate interdisciplinary applications and limitations of deep learning.

actions.label: Study theoretical foundations of deep generic sets
actions.how_to: Delve into the concepts of paper 2409.00631, focusing on complexity theory and its relation to deep learning.
actions.expected_outcome: You will gain advanced theoretical knowledge linking deep learning and computability.

metrics: Number of implemented deep learning models
Accuracy and performance of applied models on benchmark tasks
Depth of understanding demonstrated in summaries and reflections
Ability to reproduce and extend research results
Comparative evaluation results between deep learning and traditional models
Performance benchmarks of browser-based deep learning frameworks
Engagement with theoretical concepts and ability to explain them

timeline_weeks.focus: Foundations of deep learning and basic implementations
timeline_weeks.deliverable: Implement and train simple neural networks in Python

timeline_weeks.focus: Deep learning architectures and applications overview
timeline_weeks.deliverable: Summary report on architectures and use cases
Prototype autofocusing model or simulation results
Implementation and analysis of Deep-URL model

timeline_weeks.focus: Deep state space models for dynamic systems
Evaluation of deep learning on tabular data
Theoretical foundations of deep generic sets
timeline_weeks.deliverable: Summary and explanation of key theoretical concepts

risks.risk: Theoretical paper (2409.00631) may be too advanced without strong background in computability theory.
risks.mitigation: Supplement study with foundational materials on Kolmogorov complexity and computability before tackling this paper.

risks.risk: Limited practical guidance in some papers may hinder reproducibility of results.
risks.mitigation: Focus on papers with code or detailed methodology; seek additional resources if needed.

_topics_suggestion: The selected papers may also cover research areas including: Applied Machine Learning, General Algorithms, Image Segmentation, Medical Imaging, Neural Networks, Optimization Theory, Statistical Estimation. You may gain a broader understand of the field by exploring these related research directions
